home.name: I'm Júlia Luelmo.
home.intro: Public relations graduate with experience in corporate communication, social media management, and content creation. I love translating strategic ideas into meaningful stories with social impact.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I’m a Public Relations and Advertising graduate from Universitat Pompeu Fabra with experience in corporate communication, social media management, and content creation. Strategic communication and public service motivate me, and I thrive in dynamic teams that create social impact.
about.paragraph2: I now lead communication and marketing initiatives at Deal Tax & Legal, after collaborating with Diari de Barcelona as a community manager and supporting major events as a hostess. I’m responsible, organised, and collaborative, fluent in Catalan, Spanish, and English, and comfortable working with WordPress, SEO, and digital analytics.
